tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
What to say, not getting enough words to describe him. Very difficult to get such * **** doctor who is so patient, sympathetic, listen to our problem without getting irritable. He will prescribe medicine and tests as less as possible even if you insist. Inspite of being an allopathic doctor he will still suggest home remedies to treat simple ailments naturally. 
Majority of doctors I have seen have lost their touch with nutrition and basics of human health. They just try to treat symptoms but Dr. Praveen is different.

My daughter had growth issue and she was not able to sleep more than 10 min at a shot and we were so worried. I changed so many doctors but I was not satisfied with the answer of anyone. I met  Dr Praveen coincidently because I missed appointment with an scheduled doctor. I just told him my daughters problem and he gave one answer and I was like 'Full Stop'  to all my questions and my search for a perfect doctor stopped forever . He answer was so logical. And now I refer to him for both of my kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Praveen is among the best doctors I have consulted ever. He understands the patients problem very well and is very good in vaccination  as well.

But the Conveieve clinic is a mess. You will see 1 hour waiting there because of there bad management. They allot 5 mins appointments for the patients but vaccination or kids consultation generally takes around 15 mins. This leads to a lot of waiting time. Better you consult Dr Praveen in cloudnine hospital itself.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My daughter was diagnosed with Bacterial infection in chest by Dr. Praveen Kumar . He is very knowledgeable and suggested proper medication to my daughter. With in 3 days , we could see very good improvement in my daughter’s health . I highly recommended him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent doctor. I have been taking my child consultation from 4 years. He is very supportive. He responds quickly and give solution on mobile if it is simple or critical health issue. 
He treated my baby in this pandemic solution like God for 1st and in 2nd waves.Cannot explain his great behaviour and polite nature.

Thanks doctor..
